info.name: DNSSEC Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC) are enabled. The Delegation of Signing (DS) record provides information about a signed zone file when DNSSEC enabled.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 16751
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.keiruaprod.fr.	IN	 DS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 16751
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.keiruaprod.fr.	IN	 DS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.keiruaprod.fr.	21570	IN	CNAME	keiruaprod.fr.
keiruaprod.fr.	3600	IN	DS	16840 8 2 532946D5F30FF0B263645837BC176309426AA032313A4473CD1BD9C3A1586ABE

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21703
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.keiruaprod.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21703
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.keiruaprod.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.keiruaprod.fr.	86400	IN	CNAME	keiruaprod.fr.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
keiruaprod.fr.	86400	IN	SOA	dns20.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2024041900 86400 3600 3600000 86400

info.name: Email Service Detector
author: binaryfigments
info.description: An email service was detected. Check the email service or spam filter that is used for a domain.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 26339
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.keiruaprod.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 26339
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 4, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.keiruaprod.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.keiruaprod.fr.	86400	IN	CNAME	keiruaprod.fr.
keiruaprod.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com include:_spf.protonmail.ch mx ~all"
keiruaprod.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"protonmail-verification=dfa1b2d072dc1316e06262593cd68c524b03c7f8"
keiruaprod.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=FGowpopCvkmZfhWUb8BaQVp4BvMNEVT7u0N2ctjEjJk"

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
